channel.title: Black Friday on Jiangtang Hu | 胡江堂
channel.description: Recent content in Black Friday on Jiangtang Hu | 胡江堂

item.title: WordPress and Black Friday
item.description: Yes it’s BLACK that today this WordPress based blog was down for a while with a 500 error: The website encountered an error while retrieving http://www.jiangtanghu.com/blog/. It may be down for maintenance or configured incorrectly. I checked web log and it says: [24-Nov-2012 02:58:49] PHP Parse error:  syntax error, unexpected T_STRING, expecting ‘,’ or ‘;’ in ../public_html/jiangtanghu/blog/wp-content/plugins/wp-conditional-captcha/wp-conditional-captcha.php on line 401 So the problem comes from a WordPress plugin “Conditional CAPTCHA for WordPress” .
